data.name: JS Page Demo
data.detailed_description:
JS Page Demo only contains the main feature such as running your Javascript code, console window and web page window. Another limitation is that you can only run your Javascript code 10 times.

Briefly JS Page is a small bridge for using Javascript in a web page and Node. It supports executing Javascript in loaded web page and Node VM by button clicks. And it comes with several features such as node integrated webpage, console window, developer tool, script tag manager, HTML editor, resolution list calculator and color picker. So JS Page is ready for simple front-end web development and testing out your node project with default node modules. And it can be your quick Javascript programming tool.

Happy programming!

data.short_description: Run your Javascript code with the button click! JS Page Demo let you run your Javascript code 10 times. JS Page is built for programming education, project prototyping, auto-tasking and machine learning. Javascript beginners can easily start their learning with JS Page.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
